name: Dual Tennis
summary:
Super Adrenaline rush when you reach 80-100 score range. Experience it!!.
Table Tennis games can be fun because you need rapid reflex to hit the ball back. But what happens when two tables are used to play table tennis? A lot!! Get an adrenaline rush trying to defeat the two opponents in this dual table tennis game. It’s a perfect mix of casual and arcade games with cool graphics and features.
